column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of the best meals I've had in a while! I love tapas but don't get them very often. My mom and sister had been talking this place up for me
column2: and rightfully so. I got to try the brussel sprout salad
column6: and farmers market paella. It was all so amazing but I think my favorite thing overall was the squash
column7: it was a special for the week
column8: it had an amazing curry flavor and was the perfect combo of soft and crispy. The soup was delicious too
column9: super creamy. The paella was amazing too
column10: the 4 of us shared it and still had a ton left over. I would definitely love to come here again!
